body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, naive. Attended Transylvania University. Attorney in Philadelphia. Colonel of the Twenty-third Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from December 16, 1861. Appointed commander of the post of Pulaski in the District of Ohio in June 1862. Appointed commander of the post of Louisville in the District of Western Kentucky of the Department of the Ohio in December 1862. Resigned commission on December 31, 1863. Died in Louisville in 1901.
